keyMoments.title: Genzo's Debut
keyMoments.description: Genzo, the sheriff of Cocoyasi Village and father figure to Nami, is confronted by Arlong for possessing a weapon, which Arlong considers an act of rebellion.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Nami's adoptive father figure and protector of the village.

keyMoments.title: Arlong Threatens Genzo's Execution
keyMoments.description: Arlong decides to execute Genzo for possessing a weapon, but Usopp's intervention saves his life.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the lethal danger of defying Arlong's rule and sets up Usopp's heroic moment.

relationships.description: Genzo serves as an unofficial father figure to Nami, having helped raise her alongside Bell-mère. He wears a pinwheel in his cap, which he originally wore to comfort infant Nami.

evolutionMoments.description: Genzo is introduced as the village sheriff and Nami's protector.

relationships.description: Genzo opposes Arlong's tyrannical rule over Cocoyasi Village and attempts to resist despite the overwhelming power difference.

evolutionMoments.description: Arlong confronts Genzo for possessing a weapon and attempts to execute him.

reveals.information: Sheriff of Cocoyasi Village and father figure to Nami
Wears a pinwheel in his cap to comfort Nami

keyMoments.title: Dr. Nako's Debut
keyMoments.description: Dr. Nako, the elderly village doctor of Cocoyasi Village, makes his first appearance.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the village's medical professional who treated Nami and Nojiko in their childhood.

relationships.description: Nako treated Nami's injuries when she was a child and has known her throughout her life in the village.

evolutionMoments.description: Dr. Nako appears in Cocoyasi Village.

keyMoments.title: Pisaro's Debut
keyMoments.description: Pisaro, the musician of the Arlong Pirates and an ocean sunfish fish-man, makes his first appearance as part of Arlong's crew.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of another member of the Arlong Pirates crew.

relationships.description: Pisaro serves as the musician in Arlong's pirate crew and is fearful of Arlong's rage.

evolutionMoments.description: Pisaro appears as a member of the Arlong Pirates, helping restrain Arlong from destroying Cocoyasi Village.

keyMoments.title: Momoo's Debut
keyMoments.description: Momoo, a giant sea cow creature from the Grand Line, emerges from the ocean and attacks Luffy, Sanji, and Yosaku's ship.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Arlong's sea beast and introduction of sea monsters serving pirate crews.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy and Sanji
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Sanji quickly overpower Momoo with their combined strength, forcing the massive sea beast into submission.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the growing power of the Straw Hat crew.

keyMoments.title: Forced to Carry the Ship
keyMoments.description: After being defeated, Luffy forces Momoo to carry their ship toward Arlong Park.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's practical approach and captures one of Arlong's assets.

relationships.description: Momoo serves as one of Arlong's pets and sea beasts used for intimidation and combat.

evolutionMoments.description: Momoo is introduced as Arlong's sea beast.

relationships.description: Luffy defeats Momoo and forces it to carry the crew's ship.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy and Sanji defeat Momoo and force it into service.

reveals.information: Giant sea cow from the Grand Line
Arlong's sea beast used for intimidation

keyMoments.title: Nami Saves Zoro
keyMoments.description: Despite her outward allegiance to Arlong, Nami immediately dives into the pool and saves Zoro from drowning, revealing her true loyalties.
keyMoments.significance: Proves that Nami hasn't truly abandoned her humanity or her crewmates.

keyMoments.title: 100 Million Beli Deal Revealed
keyMoments.description: At Bell-mère's grave, Nami reaffirms her determination to raise 100 million bellies to buy back Cocoyasi Village from Arlong.
keyMoments.significance: Central revelation that explains Nami's entire motivation and actions throughout the arc.
keyMoments.quote: I will raise one hundred million bellies and buy back our village from Arlong.

reveals.information: Working to raise 100 million bellies to buy Cocoyasi Village back from Arlong
Still cares for the Straw Hat crew despite serving Arlong

keyMoments.title: Learning About Nami's Past
keyMoments.description: Usopp learns from Nojiko that Nami and she were orphans raised by Bell-mère, and that Nami joined Arlong's crew for a hidden reason.
keyMoments.significance: Usopp gains understanding of Nami's situation and motivations.

keyMoments.title: Heroic Intervention to Save Genzo
keyMoments.description: Usopp attacks Arlong with his slingshot to prevent Genzo's execution, demonstrating true bravery despite facing overwhelming odds.
keyMoments.significance: Major character moment showing Usopp's genuine courage when others are in danger.
keyMoments.quote: I am the brave warrior of the sea, Captain Usopp!

relationships.description: Nojiko explains Nami's past to Usopp, helping him understand the situation.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp meets Nojiko and learns about Nami's history.

keyMoments.title: Testing Nami's Loyalty
keyMoments.description: Zoro deliberately jumps into the pool to test whether Nami has truly become a heartless member of Arlong's crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's perceptiveness and willingness to risk his life to understand Nami's true character.

keyMoments.title: Zoro's Imprisonment
keyMoments.description: Following Nami's orders, Zoro is imprisoned at Arlong Park, but now understands that Nami still cares about the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the rescue subplot and confirms Zoro's understanding of Nami's true situation.
